short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to provide a daily update at 6 PM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions opens a little popup every day at 6pm to ask you about your day. 
If you don't want to wait till 6pm, you cn also 
You will then be able to see all your previous updates and your regularity in your contribution board.
